Indian Script Fonts Showcase
Hindi Telugu /
Introduction About Contact

Examples of Devanagari with new typefaces from Google Fonts

In 2014 the Google Fontsproject began publishing a series of new Devanagari typefaces. This collaborative, ongoing project helps provide typographic inspiration for using Googles new fonts for Hindi, Marathi and Nepali websites.
